title: bittraviana
author: bittraviana
content: TOP dedicated servers !!!  The best servers, different configurations , pleasant price  !!!! Supported OS:Windows, Ubuntu, Centos, Fedora, Debian, Red Hat, SUSE and otherLocations: US, Canada, Europe, UK, Norway, Japan, South Korea,  Singapore, Asia, Australia (If requested location is unavailable closest  location will be selected)General Terms for RDP / VPS​:You can restart this RDP / VPS but you cannot shutdown. You are not to use these RDP / VPS to do illegal activity. Warranty void if you are to break the terms above. Services are provided after full payment within 30 minutes after payment. Warranty: Replacement will be given for the remaining duration if any issue happen within 10 days after purchase, please treat your data with extra care as this access are temporary, always back them up in any case. Usually the server lives up to a month or more.Simple plan and pricing for your needsPrice:2 CPU + 8 RAM+oт 30 GB = 5 USD2 CPU + 16 RAM+oт 30 GB = 7 USD2 CPU + 32 RAM+150 GB = 10 USD4 CPU + 16 RAM+150 GB = 12 USD 4 CPU + 32 RAM+150 GB = 17 USD8 CPU + 32 RAM+oт 64 GB = 20 USD8 CPU + 64 RAM+128 GB = 23 USD16 CPU + 32 RAM+150 GB = 25 USD16 CPU + 128 RAM+600 GB = 30 USD32 CPU + 128 RAM+1200 GB= 45 USD32 CPU + 256 RAM+1200 GB= 55 USD 48 CPU + 192  RAM+1200 GB = 80 USD64 CPU + 256 RAM+2400 GB = 100 USD64 CPU + 512 RAM+2400 GB  = 120 USD96 CPU + 384 RAM+2400 GB  = 150 USD96 CPU + 672 RAM+2400 GB  = 180 USDOther configurations are possible.Payment method:Only Crypto (BTC/ETH/LTC/BNB/USDT/TRC20/BUSD/USDC and other cryptocurrency)Contact me:Telegram: https://t.me/profihunterYou can reach me by clicking on the Telegram link above, do not try and find me through search on Telegram. Save your money from scammers.

comments.author: Anthonyle
comments.body: this person is a scammer first I bought server from him, using my software which not against the rules then 3 days later the server is banned, he blamed on my software. I'm like okay but then he gave my new server. So to see if my software is the problem, I didnt install anything to the new server -> 3 days later it got banned again and he refused to refund me or replace me new server he also deleted all the chatSo please do not buy anything from this man he is a scammer

comments.author: bittraviana
comments.body: Quote from: Anthonyle on January 31, 2023, 02:00:19 PMthis person is a scammer first I bought server from him, using my software which not against the rules then 3 days later the server is banned, he blamed on my software. I'm like okay but then he gave my new server. So to see if my software is the problem, I didnt install anything to the new server -> 3 days later it got banned again and he refused to refund me or replace me new server he also deleted all the chatSo please do not buy anything from this man he is a scammer The man is a liar. He got a server from me at a 25 percent discount. After three days of use the server was banned because of his actions on the server. According to my rules in such a case there is no monyback.  View screenshot : https://ibb.co/wWt225cAfter persuasion I gave him a new server. The new server got banned again because of his actions.Where is the scam ? I gave you a server twice.Stop lying.

comments.author: Anthonyle
comments.body: do you understand english? for the new server I told you that I have not install anything, I was just leaving it there to see if the 1st server got banned because of my software - I was right, the second server is banned without using anythingwhen I came to you telling you that the secodn server got banned what do I get? - You straight up blocked my telegram man. what a scammer - man you're a scammer please go away

comments.author: bittraviana
comments.body: You got two servers from me, one of them was a discount of 25 percent. And you write that I'm a scammer? Well, well....QuoteI was just leaving it there to see if the 1st server got banned because of my software - I was right, the second server is banned without using anythingWhy should I believe what you say? I believed you once. After that you got a second ban.
